name: Unblock Block Puzzle Game
description:
The square box is stacked with many wooden building blocks of various sizes. Your task is to slide the wooden or building blocks to unblock me.

The block is blocked inside a square container and you need to get it out. This is a very popular classic solitaire puzzle that people love to play when they want to relax and play some light games. However, the later levels are quite challenging and you will need to try several times before you succeed in getting the wood plank out. If you’ve ever played other types of slider games, you will realize that some levels are easier than the others and some are very challenging, even though the difficulty level might be the same. The key is to keep trying and never give up!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEST FEATURES OF UNBLOCK CONTAINER – MOVE THE BLOCK PUZZLE:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
• A version of a popular classic solitaire puzzle game for every age.
• Slide the building blocks in the square box to move the ublock out of the box.
• Try to win the level with the least move as possible.
• Try to get as many stars as possible
• 4 levels of difficulty: Beginner, Advanced, Master, and Expert
• Addictive and challenging slider wood puzzle.ds

Unblock Container is a very replayable game, means it is very fun to replay the levels. Why should I replay these slider wood puzzles? You should replay the levels to see if you can solve it with lesser amount of moves and get more stars. The more stars you have, the more levels you can unlock. After all if you can’t complete the levels in low difficulty level, you won’t be able to complete the levels in the Expert level.

If you enjoy playing our slider wood puzzle game, please take a minute to leave a rating and review on our Appstore Page!
